short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collects all browser activities for Contact Summary Report.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool is for internal use only. The tool aims to collect all browsing activities of the client (Customer Support Agents) to generate Reports as part of our Process Improvement Platform.
